name: dark (itch) (zzox)
description:
rules:

avoid enemies, gaps and auto-shooters.  swing your melee to launch pests and block projectiles, shoot to destroy pests.

controls:

left/right arrows: move

up/down arrows: aim

a: jump/double jump

s: swing

d (hold): shoot

framework is phaser by photonstorm

font is manaspace font by codeman38

music, sfx, art and gameplay coding by zzox (tyler)
